website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer your iPad Air keyboard bonded to a complete case, the Belkin Qode Ultimate Keyboard Case lives up to its name and delivers a great experience.
pros: The Belkin Qode Ultimate Keyboard Case for iPad Air has multiple viewing angles, magnetic autoconnecting Bluetooth pairing, and a great keyboard
The keyboard folds underneath when you don't need it
cons: Thin plastic back case that the Air snaps into feels fragile

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is thee keyboard to get for your iPad!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 keyboards before this, and this Belkin case simply annihilates them! It's really a clever design in that the cover snaps open magnetically at 3 different angles. The keyboard is also high quality with a strong bluetooth connection that connects instantaneously. The closest competing case I've used was Logitech, which broke in 2 days so I only had the keyboard. That Logitech keyboard with a stand slot would frequently lose bluetooth connection no matter how much I charged it. Overall this just feels like a more quality product, and it's far better looking in person than in the advertisements. I wouldn't hesistate to get this at all. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Too many "CONS" to be a worthwhile purchase.  Worthwhile if only used on a table.
customer_reviews.text: Not as functional as described. Pros: 1. easy to sync, 2. Able to use the iPAD air as a tablet by folding the keyboard behind it, 3. magnets hold iPAD in place fairly well, 4. Adequate cut outs in iPAD cover to access all buttons and ports, very importantly the charging port (unlike the ClamCase. CONS: 1.Non Standard Keyboard Layout (Keys in unusual places, commonly used keys require a shift/key press to use, such as : / < >, 2. Intermittent failure of keystroke to transmit, especially space key, 3. Highly flexable hinge/iPad back rest is too floppy when used on the lap. I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: UncleBob

customer_reviews.title: Belkin QODE Keyboard for iPad Air increases productivity on the go
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, the Belkin QODE Keyboard for the iPad Air gets the job done and has a series of benefits with limited negatives. Pros: Keys have descent travel Standard placed keys unlike other keyboards Easy to slide iPad Air in/out without much damage Multiple angles allows for use on lap or on table top Full protection on all sides of iPad AIr Charges via standard micro usb cable which is included Cons: Even though lighter than other keyboards, makes the iPad Air thicker and heavier Keyboard not very durable if dropped. Already did and aluminum shell started to separate from keyboard layer in corner. Feature requests: Lighted keyboard Lighter design
customer_reviews.author: nrgflow

customer_reviews.title: Superb Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard now for 3 years and am continuously impressed by how well it functions. It truely makes the iPad feel like a laptop, with functions such as copy and paste seemlessly integrated. Connection is a breeze, typing is a pleasure, and the magnetic stand works well for holding the ipad in place. Most importantly for me, the battery lasts and lasts. I do not use the keyboard every day, but keep it on my device as it's permanent case. I charge the keyboard about every 6 months, and without fail it has been ready for me to use whenever I need it. It's a reliable product and goes above and beyond to improve my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice iPad case
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this case. it is well built, easy to use and looks really nice. I get compliments on it everytime i am using it. The only issue (which is not really an issue) is that the magnets leave marks where the iPad holder attaches to the keyboard. but this is very minor as you can just wipe them off. Maybe they will use better quality magnets on future versions. But this by no means will deter me from buying another one if anything happens to the current one. The keyboard battery life is great. I can go weeks without bothering to recharge it. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. Najjar

customer_reviews.title: expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best ipad case ever! The magnets keep it closed when it should stay closed, work well with the auto turn on/off, and hold the case open in 3 different positions very very well. Automatic turn on/off of the keyboard when the ipad is locked into upright position is also a plus. Great tactile feel to the keys, and no shut down button near the delete key which is a really annoying key placement found on several other similar cases. This case is one of the most expensive, but it is definitely worth it if you plan on typing a lot on your ipad.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Don't. Just Don't.
customer_reviews.text: It's a conceptually viable keyboard for iPad, but fails in terms of actual utility. My unit was never abused, never even had so much as a single fall or drop. It failed to function about six months into my ownership of it. It appears to be charged, but won't pair. Not only will it not pair, my iPad Air doesn't even see it. It sees other devices, but not this one. This leads me to infer that the Bluetooth transmitter in the unit has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Awesomenessss!! Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard case is the best I've bought. I've had the Griffin/Griffith shockproof case (great investment by the way, but too bulky), but I wanted a keyboard for the iPad. I bought the Zagg slim keyboard (lasted almost two months 😁), but it broke so easily. I wanted a keyboard case that was shockproof and stylish. I'm not a big "name-brand" person, but with an expensive iPad... Hey, you gotta go with it. This case is everything that I wanted plus the keyboard can "disappear" if you just want to use the screen or show someone something. Pricy, but definitely definitiely worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: ArtGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard case is perfect for the ipad 9.7”. It has 3 magnetic positions and an excellent keyboard. It is lightweight and easy to take anywhere. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Wray

customer_reviews.title: Makes your pad a laptop.  A normal keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one when my IPAD Air first came out. Workhorse. Always on my lap or thrown on my desk. Finally on its last legs, and back for another one. Great keyboard, great (3) angles to use. Like that if folds back also. This held a charge like nobody's business. Phones should last so long.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Facts, Jack!

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing! I've read a few reviews about the blue tooth not working properly and magnets falling off, but I've had no problems. This case fits like a glove and it's easy to remove. The blue tooth connects quickly and the magnets hold it firmly in place, even when I place the iPad on my lap. I think the only drawback is the colors are so boring!
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Turn iPad into a Laptop, great!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Turn my iPad into a ultra thin laptop computer. Now I leave my MBP at home, and just carry my iPad around for work. When I get back to home office, I just use my iMac. MBP is collecting dust. The only thing I don't like is the placement of some keys. To make the keyboard smaller, Belkin move some of the important keys to award places. Keys such as : " / were moved. So it will get some used to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael JJ

customer_reviews.title: after one year, no warranty! the tech support asked me to get a new device! no even able to repair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: "Taking all of these factors into account, wehave determined that the reasonable life span of this product is 5 years from the date of your purchase of the product" - this is not correct! After one year using, my keyboard stop working! it was great when i first got it, but half year later the problem started, on and off. and now it is totally not working! I contacted the belkin tech online help, they gave me the phone number to call, i called the number, the she told me to buy a new device instead of helping me to answer my question like where can i send it to repair....
customer_reviews.author: yessi

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard for a year and a half and not one problem. I love typing on it and it makes using my ipad air 2, yes, I use with my air 2 even though I bouht it for the air, and it fits just fine and easy to get work done. The only thing I would like to have is to be able to solar charge. I would buy a new keyboard if they would make a solar charging keyboard. Otherwise I wouldnt change anything.
customer_reviews.author: The soul of reason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard/Case
customer_reviews.text: FYI: I was thrown off by this being offered in silver, black and white since the iPad Air is only offered in Silver and Black. The silver was severely backordered, so I gambled and ordered white. It matches the silver iPad Air (whose front is white anyway) just like you would expect. The keyboard is a silver aluminum color and one side is white when closed. That's a convoluted way of saying it matches just fine (and works great too!).
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBits

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad Air Keyboard Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best keyboard case for the iPad Air - I've tried several, but this is the most secure, lightweight, low profile case available. I've been using mine now for 7 months and the some of the protective rubber covers that go over the magnets fell off. That hasn't effected anything though and this has been my favorite case by far. I've had several people ask me where I got it, and have ordered ones for themselves. I'm a heavy user - on my iPad at aleast 2 hours each day and don't need to charge for 2 months at a time...
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts soooo long. Typing is comfortable even for someone with big hands like myself. Provides great protection for both front and back without making it too bulky. Good feel to the keys. Only negatives in my opinion: 1) It's tough to use on a non-hard surface (e.g. bed). 2) It's kinda bulky when you use your ipad without the keyboard (i.e., covering the keyboard with your ipad and using it in flat mode)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fiuk

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for those who like to tactile type
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is an absolute life saver. Unlike its competitors, this one has a covering for the front AND back of the iPad when it is closed. I receive several compliments on this product. As I use the keyboard occasionally, the charge holds for weeks. Very easy to type, and I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DaMour Da Merrier

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is even better than shown. The keyboard is the best iPad keyboard I have used and the case is minimal and I love the way it folds into the reader mode.I also love the way it turns off and on by merely setting it upright on a magnetic strip and then when switching to reader mode it automatically turns the keyboard off. I highly recommend this product and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case and Easy to use Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Keyboards are a must for me. I just like a keyboard, and most importantly I like a case that doesnt add weight to my ipad. This case is great for my needs. There is no rotation which I do miss in this version of the Belkin cases, but it is very thin, and slips right into my bag. The case hugs the sides of the ipad and keeps it very secure. The case has a soft but solid feel to it, and the keys are fast and well placed.
customer_reviews.author: The Peppy Techie

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is almost completely true to a full-size keyboard. The : and ; are in the "wrong" place but I can live with that. The positives (unlike other keyboards) - 2 shift keys, apostrophe in the correct position, very thin and sturdy, strong magnets keep it upright in 3 positions and keep it closed, Siri button, separate arrow keys. The negatives - price is expensive but I believe you get what you pay for, a bit heavy but solid. Would definitely recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: Admstr

customer_reviews.title: Just Do It
customer_reviews.text: Oh My God, this thing is awesome. If you are considering purchasing a keyboard case, I would not even hesitate purchasing this one. I'm super happy and suprised at how much utility a keyboard actually adds to the device. It's an attractive addition and must have now that MS Office is available for Ipad. The formulas in MS Excel are now meaningful enough to do spreadsheet work in. Also, writing a review on this keyboard is a joy. For the backlit option of people complaining about this or that, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: cabasand

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for moving around.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case and the way the keyboard types. I think it will protect the iPad well. A couple of keys have been moved around, so that will take some getting used to. However, I teach, and I'd like to move around the classroom while using the iPad and the whole assembly isn't really stable enough to move around with it. I'd also like to take data with it in the field and it's certainly not stable enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Always Honest

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not wast my money on this keyboard! Keys on right side are placed weird and I’m constantly sending messages before I’m done on accident. It also looses connection sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This case is perfect. Not too big, handy with keyboard or with keyboard folded away in back
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a case for protection, that incorporated a keyboard, but would also be able to be used when holding in hand and writing notes directly onto screen. This case meets those expectations very well. The keyboard works well for answering emails, and when typing a lot and wanting the full screen for viewing. The keyboard also nicely folds out of the way in back of the tablet. This case offers good protection for the tablet. The only negative, although I cannot figure out anything better, is that taking pictures with the case, is cumbersome and not easy because the keyboard obscures the camera when folded in back, and covers the screen when in front
customer_reviews.author: MrJM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Add-on for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Hard to quantify how much more productive this excellent keyboard has made my iPad Air. Typing is a breeze. I use a fair amount of writing apps, so this item was essential. Bought it a year ago and only just now getting around to reviewing it. Why is that pertinent? Because I use it every day and it's still a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fingerman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this when I first bought it. I worked great and it was so nice to have a keyboard to work with. However, this didn't last more than a year. Bummed because I love the concept, too bad it doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Useful accessory
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Writing this review with it. Makes my ipad almost like a laptop. The charge on the keyboard lasts forever. There are a few punctuation keys in slighly odd places, due to the compact nature of the keyboard. It has taken some getting used to for these few keys (: : ' " ~ < >) but as they are lesser used keys, it isn't a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn E. Prenger

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: upon receiving the box, i immediately opened it and set it up. the only thing i was disappointed with was that it didn't come charged. after charging for a bit, it was an easy setup process of finding the bluetooth signal on my ipad to connect the two. the thing i really like about this is the strength of the magnet holding the screen. even on my lap, the magnet holds your screen securely in place. a win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Garber

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Good not great... Especially for international keyboards. I can't use all the keys if I'm using my native language(icelandic) and the alternative keys aren't in the right place. In an excel document if I write a letter with a comma, it appears as if I put a comma before the letter which is quite annoying('á). This keyboard has a lot of potential but can't reach it without neccessary changes for international consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Fjölnir Þrastarson

customer_reviews.title: The best keyboard case for ipad air!
customer_reviews.text: I tried two other keyboard cases and this one is by far the best. It is so light and folds very flat. The magnets hold the ipad securely and when you want to use it as a tablet it folds and seems like your just holding the ipad. I don't think you will find a better keyboard case anywhere and the white keyboard case compliments my white ipad. It also looks very professional. I am the envy at my business meetings. I charged it three months ago and it is still going strong. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Apgar

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I just can't give five stars to this. It is very awkward for me to use on my lap, and it adds too much weight when I'm just using the iPad as a reader. Also, the keys are too close together for my big hands. I've found "true happiness" with a Hausbell H8 detached keyboard. See my other reviews for that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several keyboards for my iPad Air and even used one of the original belkin keyboards (White one) and I wanted a black one with back lit keys and I had tried one of the cheap $49 ones and that was just ok, but I wanted a better one and this one fits my daily needs. A bit n the pricey side but worth the money. I feels very solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse6749

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping to find.
customer_reviews.text: The design of this case with built-in keyboard makes the iPad Air feel like a highly functioning notebook. The magnetic base that keeps the screen in place is a stroke of genius. I was considering less expensive options, but I'm happy I spent the extra money. Paired with the Textilus app, Belkin has brought to an end my days of dragging my MBP to Panera or SB.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I like how you can adjust the angle of the iPad, I like the magnetic quality of it so there are no grooves or snaps. The keys are spaced perfectly for heavy typing and the case is also very light and does not add hardly any extra weight to the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Lorraine Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this keyboard case, I've seen many other keyboard cases online and was skeptical about purchasing them, after reading reviews and watching youtube videos, I would say I'm so glad I decided on this one. The price is a little high but its totally worth it! The case itself is durable and the keyboard is super easy to use! (I am using this case to write this review now lol) I purchased the white one and I got it on sale! The only down fall about it is that its a little heavy, but it no problem for me. I would definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine H

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant! Thought for executive people I think. The aluminium material makes this case a first class in the market. The keybord is very comfortable with function keys and an elegant design. The magnetic functionality to hold the IPAD is awesome!! You have 3 positions to use the IPAD display You pay what you have.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this keyboard & case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this keyboard & case! Makes my iPad seem like a laptop...I use it so much! So many people have commented on it! I have had it for over a year now, and I can honestly say that I have charged it like maybe 5 times. I have dropped my iPad a couple times and this case has saved my iPad from being ruined. The only "negative" wold be the rubberized magnet covers came off within the first few months, but that has not diminished the functionality of the product in one way. Would I purchase again...YES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisalou

customer_reviews.title: I just love IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Belkin QODE Ultimate Wireless Keyboard and Case for my iPad Air about 2 or 3 weeks ago and at first I didn't feel comfortable using it but after a couple of days everything fell right in place. Now I can't keep my hands off of it. It's pretty and nicely made and I take it every where... It's like an American Express I don't leave home without it. I really suggest if anyone is looking for a keybord for the iPad Air this is the keyboard for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hollins White

customer_reviews.title: Well-Built Keyboard with Excellent Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying typing on my ipad more than ever. The keypads has sufficient travel that allows user to feel comfortable typing away. I have absolutely no qualms to recommend anyone should you be in the market for a Bluetooth keyboard. Belkin claimed a battery life of 160 hours, I have used it for a week now and have not charged the keyboard since its first charge.
customer_reviews.author: vanila

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, directions for set up could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, directions for set up could be better. Finally figured out you have to go to settings to set key board. Make air heavy to hold and some problems figuring out how to close. Husband needs keyboard since he has Parkinson's and hard to type other wise. Overall he is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: excellent keyboard and case
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum case compliments the iPad Air perfectly. The keyboard has a nice feel to it and it folds out of the way when not in use. I am not a fan of having a keyboard all of the time but the keyboard does not add much to the thickness or weight of the iPad where it becomes objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Its solid protection for your ipad air. The magnets are strong and will keep the lid closed and alsokeep the ipad up in the upright position. the keys on the keyboard ar very responsive, without a cheap feel. The only thing i dont like, that its HEAVY! about 2 lbs with the ipad. If thats the only thing, its well work the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Neely

customer_reviews.title: Its a great case, and the magnet support is fantastic for ...
customer_reviews.text: i have bought this case for all my sales reps to use with their iPads. Its a great case, and the magnet support is fantastic for holding up the iPad. I've had to replace one of them for the magnet falling out, but I have 8 of them, so 1 out of 8 isn't that bad!
customer_reviews.author: NOVA Mitchell Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ipad keyboard. It provides the safety/coverage of a case, is very sleek, and is incredibly functional. If I could make it *perfect* I would add another angle for the screen where you could set it at a 90 degree angle at the edge of the keyboard, and also be able to stand it up vertically.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for several months now and it works great. It is very easy to use. It is a bit bulky but that is normal for any case that includes a keyboard. If you are looking for a case with a keyboard this is a great product. If you don't need the keyboard then just buy a normal case.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard, however it took me a while to get used to because the buttons on my old one were located in different places. Good, lasting battery life and great keyboard and cover all around.
customer_reviews.author: TT316

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard case!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best keyboard case on the market. Stays connected. The battery lasts a pretty long time. Really high quality and easy to use. The keys are positioned well, although it does take a little getting used to just because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: BDP1

customer_reviews.title: Key stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The letter o stopped working after limited use. It seems the warranty is for only 3 months. Not acceptable for such a expensive product. This is the most expensive iPad keyboard in the market
customer_reviews.author: Sonic Sherpa

customer_reviews.title: BEST keyboard case for ipad air
customer_reviews.text: BEST keyboard case for ipad air hands down!!!! have been using for two months now and it is awesome. i had tried every single keyboard case for the Air and this is the best. speed typing, long lasting battery, multi angled viewing. Will be doing a full video review soon!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Scouras

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. I've had this for 5 months and have yet to recharge the keyboard. It's a bit heavy but works great for travel and protection as well. Operation is flawless so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Good initial quality but falls apart in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for 9 months. After 3 months, 1 key fell off and all the soft plastic protectors covering metal parts and magnets came off. After 6 months, a corner broke off when removing the iPad from the case. Last week, one of the magnets connecting to the keyboard came out, making it impossible to use. The case is great but does not withstand daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Franziska Zenhaeusern

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad protector with a keyboard that's functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard I had a Logitech and it broke up on the corners after one month. This one holds the whole iPad, and I love it has a caps lock button, definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth component was not very strong and the battery died ...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth component was not very strong and the battery died quickly. After 3 months of use it refused to charge so I was unable to use it and I had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rehm

customer_reviews.title: I decided to go with a good quality one like Belkin
customer_reviews.text: I had tried to save my money by using cheaper wireless keyboard. They were about $30. But It lasted about a month because I use iPad all the time. Finally, I decided to go with a good quality one like Belkin. I am not regret for paying much more for this. It is tough and looks great. The case protect my iPad very well. Really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gaminuniverse

customer_reviews.title: Better than Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 logitech cases in the past. One had the corner magnet break (my fault) the second one had the corner magnet just stop holding my ipad...no reason. From the beginning, I've liked this ipad case better than the logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E. Zervic

customer_reviews.title: I really like this case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case, easy to use and well built, light weight and stylish for exceptivos. I'd wish the front would not get so marked with finge sprints. overall a great case with keyboard and have recommended to colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: julio rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed in an iPad case. I need a keyboard for work, but still like to use the iPad as a stand alone. The keyboard flips around to the back so I can use it without having to detach it from the keyboard. It protects well and is very slim.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Goodwine

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my wife. While I have my own iPad Air, I do not have my own keyboard. This was her first leap to iProducts so I researched as much as I could. So far, she has been very pleased with it and even though it does add some weight to carry around, I have rarely seen her with out them together. That speaks for itself, to me. I have given it a spin or two, myself, and if I choose to buy another keyboard, this would certainly be my choice.
customer_reviews.author: David Negrotto

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has completely changed how I use my iPad. With this, your iPad becomes a fully functional laptop in a perfectly small form factor. They layout is great and the keys are nicely clicky. There are slight downsides - it's a little annoying to not be able to rotate the screen to portrait and the keyboard does lock up the device from time to time (although i blame this on apple, not the keyboard). All and all, this turns a fun device into a totally functional machine, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The case is lightweight, sleek and professional looking and holds the iPad Air very securely. The three options for positioning the iPad work very well. The keyboard has a wonderful feel. It is very convenient not to have to turn on the keyboard for each use. The Bluetooth connection has occurred automatically, without fail, since the first pairing.
customer_reviews.author: MJMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function, perfect accessory for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight, excellent fit and function. I bought if for a friend with some physical challenges with strength and flexibility. This cover doesn't add too much weight to the iPad Air and it is easy enough to open and manipulate. I can't wait for a new version for the iPad Air 2.
customer_reviews.author: thehovc

customer_reviews.title: Belkin QODE ultimate keyboard for iPad
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and shipping was extremely quick. Only complaint is keyboard is a tad small but I knew that before buying (it's for an iPad so there ya go!). Four stars as product could use better ergonomics (for me) regarding keyboard. A great product though. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just Winding Up

customer_reviews.title: Great product - sturdy construction - would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Have had good success with this case on both the iPad Air and iPad 3. Sturdy enough when used on a hard surface but need to make sure it's secure when resting on your lap. Would purchase it again for any future upgrades to the iPad if needed. Interesting how the white version was a significantly lower priced that the black.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, have had absolutely no issues with it! Protective, and useful. One of the few cases I could find that would still allow you to use your tablet as a tablet when it was in the case.
customer_reviews.author: akkdfz

customer_reviews.title: OK but with some opportunities.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far and has a very nice design. However. Installation (Bluetooth coupling) and usage is not as easy as expected. You have to have your iPad in the right Position to couple it. And when the Keyboard isn't charged it won't connect. Unfortunately you don't see that really. Visualization could be better (different LED).
customer_reviews.author: AngiSoc

customer_reviews.title: ecxellent and stable
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be a bit rough on my possessions so getting an iPad Air for meetings was a bit of a leap. However, this keyboard case is as stable as the reviewer stated. It also looks great - I have had several compliments from coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Lily MD

customer_reviews.title: So far this product is fantastic. The only reason I am giving it a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is fantastic. The only reason I am giving it a 4 and not a 5 is because it is a little pricey and the functionality is a bit tough getting used to (this would be normal for anyone who starts using a keyboard with an iPad for the first time.). Other than that, I am happy with my device.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year now and it has worked pretty well with moderate use. Battery is not as strong now but still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It is unreliable and does not stay connected to my Ipad. I am going back to my prior Logitech keyboard in preference. At least it worked consistently.
customer_reviews.author: T. Scheel

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Only challenge is that it's quite heavy. Trade off is that it's lighter than a laptop but significantly heftier than Just the iPad. As a result I snap it on and off As needed which is a tad tiresome. Otherwise it dies exactly what I expect it to do!
customer_reviews.author: mwihaki

customer_reviews.title: Very good in many ways
customer_reviews.text: Very good in many ways. Cool how it turns on and off automatically but if you're a touch typist the odd position of some keys will really throw you.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Dawson

customer_reviews.title: great keyboard, secure case
customer_reviews.text: Just about perfect. nice design, excellent, comfortable keyboard for typing. Attractive and flexible in position choices. No complaints. folds flat to use as just keyboard. the way the keyboard connects when you set it up is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matisse54

customer_reviews.title: I got this in late December 2013 and already the left arrow key popped off!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing quality. My ipad air with Belkin QODE Ultimate Wireless Keyboard and Case is only used for business but the left arrow key popped off and would not snap back on. I ve been having to press the rubber like thing absent the arrow chiclet key but it responds with difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Dan I. Siazon

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: I've had other devices for the ipad 2 in the past. now that I have the ipad air, I bought this primarily on reviews. my experience is that it works well and looks great. it protects my ipad. no issues connecting via blue tooth, no latency issues, works as intended and as a bonus the magnets are placed to adjust the pitch of the ipad so you can view at different angles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Case Keyboard Combination for you investment
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard allows for greater functionality and ease of use when access website or typing document. Battery life is unbelievable. I charge the keyboard, I can't remember when I last charged it and I use it all the time. The case is not as sleek as I wish, but it does add protection, I've dropped it more than once.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she just loves it. Works just as described. Great features and protection for her iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 (not bad) cuz im not sure about the people experience with this product cuz most of them complaining about the quality of this keyboard, for my 1 month experience its a good keyboard it fell on the ground and got a scratch and its still working
customer_reviews.author: DARK

customer_reviews.title: iPad air, keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: This is my third keyboard case. This one by far is the best, very responsive and is not to heavy, battery life is good, no problems there. Keyboard is very friendly and almost identical to the keyboard on my mac. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: J. Cart

customer_reviews.title: Paid twice as much at AT&T
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Great buy! Bought it to replace the cover I bought from AT&T at double the price for the exact same case that I broke.
customer_reviews.author: mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice keyboard. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard. Highly recommend. I like the feel and the sound of the keys. Doesnt need to be charged often. Just make sure that your bluetooth settings are on so that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia N. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard case! I love that I can still fold my iPad down so I can use it as just a tablet. I like the 3 different places to can set the tablet so you don't have a glare. The quality is good, very sturdy. I like that the keys don't make too much noise when typing and the battery lasts a long time! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Cross

customer_reviews.title: apparently much better than the one made for the iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Works well, apparently much better than the one made for the iPad Air 2. Stays connected and I like the three positions
customer_reviews.author: DecFlower CA

customer_reviews.title: Great case for school
customer_reviews.text: I have the Belkin QODE Ultimate case for ipad air and it works great. The case automatically turns off and on depending if the magnets on the case are activated. They keyboard is not cramped at all and also has great special function keys which allow you to adjust brightness and sound settings.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Belkin QODE Ultimate Wireless Keyboard and Case for iPad Air (iPad 5)
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a trip and it was durable enough to protect the ipad air. the only thing was that it rubbed again my black laptop which created some scratches on the surface of the silver case.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly. Easy to set up, and connects every time. Robust case. Just really wish there was a greater choice of colours! This is the second one I have bought ( his & hers ) as I was so pleased with the ease of use with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this because it's lightweight, flexible, and the silver color and design looks like it's actually part of the Apple case. Everyone who sees it asks me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: All you need for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: Protects the iPad when closed, provides a handy stand and nice keyboard when open. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality but would not charge
customer_reviews.text: Got the cover. Very nice quality but would not charge. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: kimnova

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: NICE AIDE FOR TYPING, VIEWING. LOVE THE 3 POSITION FOR MY IPAD. GLAD I PICKED THIS BELTON PRODUCT, ADDS TO MY IPAD AIR
customer_reviews.author: Esther M. Mujica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard case for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that the black version wasn't available when I ordered so I had to get the white one. Otherwise, it's an outstanding USB keyboard case for the air. Automatically turns on and off when you put the pad into one of three magnetically attracted positions. Keyboard charges via USB and lasts forever. Maybe not the most graceful thing to hold when it's folded back on itself and not being used as a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. High quality, nice design, good battery life and the keyboard is spaced perfectly. My favorite feature is that it turns on/off automatically.
customer_reviews.author: michael1818

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this. The one area I do not like is the white backing. Wish the area behind the Ipad was aluminum instead of all white plastic. Other than that it is a great wireless keyboard that is an awesome value
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miles

customer_reviews.title: Turned my iPad into a useable business tool, no ...
customer_reviews.text: Turned my iPad into a useable business tool, no longer need to bring my laptop on trips to keep up with work emails.
customer_reviews.author: GRD

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality keyboard. Works perfectly with new iPad Air and provides excellent protection when closed. Highly recommended if you use you tablet as a laptop...
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Cause ipad freezing frequently.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good keyboard and case combination for an iPad air. But I do not know why, when I use it, it always makes my iPad freezing. Because of that, I have asked apple to replace a new iPad air for me already. I am thinking of return, because I do not want my iPad to be freezing all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mengmeng Fang

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and very effective. The magnets allow you to adjust where you want the screen to sit in relation to the keyboard, which is a great size whether you have big or small hands. When closed it protects the screen and the keyboard doesn't scratch the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Talei Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several ipad keyboards over the course of 3 years. This is the ONE. Other keyboards that I have tried left marks on the screen when folded against it, but this one comes away clean. The key action and touch is excellent. Very satisified with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Freshair

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy case. I would recommend this product to other iPad users that would like a case that offers a light, user-friendly Bluetooth keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Callahan

customer_reviews.title: It looks fine; however
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine; however, when started using it and in no more than a couple of weeks, the thin rubber dampers covering the two magnets peeled off. No matter what you do later, every time you glue it back it peels off agai!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: Belkin QODE Ultimate Keyboard Case for iPad Air (White)
product_meta.description:
Turn your iPad Air into a laptop with the Belkin QODE Ultimate Keyboard Case. The well-spaced keys offer the movement and response of a laptop keyboard, making emails and word processing far easier and more comfortable than typing on a tablet's touchscreen. Smart sensing technology automatically turns the keyboard on when you need to use it, and off when you don't. The case supports multiple viewing angles to help you find the most comfortable position for watching videos or reading blogs. Made of aircraft grade aluminum, the lightweight keyboard acts as a cover offering exceptional protection for your iPad Air while the case prevents it from being scratched.

 Turns your iPad Air into a fully functioning laptop with well-spaced keys that let you type faster and more accurately (shown in black).
View larger

 Magnets hold your iPad Air securely at different angles for comfortable use (shown in black).
View larger

TYPE COMFORTABLY ON YOUR IPAD AIR
 The Belkin QODE Ultimate Keyboard Case for iPad Air lets you type easily and comfortably with your tablet. This lightweight, sturdy keyboard case has well-spaced TruType keys that offer the movement and response of a laptop keyboard. You'll type faster and more accurately than you do on your iPad Air's touchscreen alone.

The keyboard folds away when you don't need it and strong neodymium magnets hold your tablet securely at a variety of comfortable angles, so you can comfortably watch videos or browse the internet.

ALUMINUM ALLOY KEYBOARD PROTECTS YOUR IPAD AIR
The keyboard's base is made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy. It's exceptionally lightweight but strong enough to provide hard-shell protection for your iPad Air's screen when the case is closed. Its base is thinner than the iPad Air, so it keeps your tablet portable and easy to slip into a bag or purse.

 Additionally, the case's high-performance material protects the back of your iPad Air and doubles as a stand, adding function without compromising the case's ultra-thin profile.

SMART SENSING TECHNOLOGY SAVES BATTERY LIFE
This keyboard uses smart sensing technology that automatically turns on your keyboard when you need it, and powers it down when you don't. 

The keyboard's battery provides 264 hours of active use and 4,300 hours of standby time.

COMPATIBILITY INFORMATION
 The Belkin QODE Ultimate Keyboard Case is compatible with the iPad Air.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Keyboard case, USB-to-micro-USB charging cable, and quick installation guide.

BELKIN QODE ULTIMATE KEYBOARD CASE (WHITE)
AT A GLANCE:
 * Lightweight, strong protection for iPad Air
 * Enjoy fast, accurate typing with well-spaced, responsive keys
 * Case supports multiple viewing angles
 * Keyboard folds out of your way for handheld mode
 * Smart sensing technology automatically turns keyboard on and off
 * Offers up to 264 hours of active battery life between charges

 Keyboard folds out of the way for comfortable reading and viewing (shown in black).
View larger
feature_bullets: Convert your iPad Air into what feels like a full functioning laptop (Not Compatible With AIR 2)
Three neodymium magnets keep the iPad Air securely in place and automatically turn the keyboard on and off, so that the keyboard is only on when you're using it.
Light and slim - a mere .75 inches thick
Strong and sturdy, crafted from aircraft grade aluminum
Keyboard folds out of the way for comfortable reading and viewing
Extended battery life. 280mAh battery provides 1900-hour active battery life / 4300-hour standby battery life
Precise positioning system with neodymium magnets hold your iPad securely at variety of comfortable angles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars380 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
